summary: Fire. Fire! - Fire. Fire is the world’s first and only portable fire pit company. They design, build, and maintain fires for public and private outdoor events. Their staff of firefighters provides warmth and light for guests to relax and enjoy the party. They offer services such as design, build, and maintenance of fires using local sustainably harvested wood. Fire. Fire! is staffed by firefighters trained in fire safety to ensure a safe event experience. They also have a store with offerings like 4ft and 6ft fire pits.
